text: Sune Bergman (5 December 1952 - August 2021) was a Swedish ice hockey player and manager. When coaching HV71 the club won the 1995 Swedish national championship. Bergman died in August 2021, aged 68.Trenerlegenden Sune Bergman er d√∏d == References == Category:1952 births Category:Swedish ice hockey goaltenders Category:2021 deaths
